description: AbstractFillingSurface is the abstract superclass for different kinds of surfaces that seal openings filled by filling elements.

properties.name: lod3ImplicitRepresentation
properties.description: Relates to an implicit geometry that represents the AbstractFillingSurface in Level of Detail 3. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod4ImplicitRepresentation
properties.description: Relates to an implicit geometry that represents the AbstractFillingSurface in Level of Detail 4. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.
